title: Swagger-ui 404 in prod mode
body:
### Describe the bug

On Quarkus 3.12.0, 
relevant application.properties:
```
quarkus.resteasy-reactive.path=/mypath  
quarkus.swagger-ui.always-include=true  
quarkus.swagger-ui.path=/mypath/swagger  
quarkus.swagger-ui.validator-url=none
```
the default `/mypath/swagger` renders in dev mode but when running in prod mode, even though the swagger-ui feature is installed, the service returns a 404 on `/mypath/swagger`, log message shows: jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException: HTTP 404 Not Found and the logged request path is `/mypath/swagger/index.html`

### Expected behavior

the swagger-ui is rendered in prod mode as it is in dev mode

### Actual behavior

the swagger-ui gets 404 in prod mode

### How to Reproduce?

will add later

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_
